suite.name: Wishlist Add Test & Wishlist Remove Test

test.name: Verify user as guest can add item to Wishlist successfully then wishlist update correctly after login

kw.name: Launch SuperSport application, select language
kw.doc: Launch application,select english language

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Select english language
kw.doc: Select english language at welcome page

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click to target element ${locator} - Locator of target element ${timeout} - Waiting time for target element visible

kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)
kw.msg: Element 'android=UiSelector().resourceIdMatches(".*id/product_name$")' text is 'NIKE ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Women's Running Shoes'
${text} = NIKE ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Women's Running Shoes
${product_info} = NIKE ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Women's Running Shoes
${product_info} = NIKE ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2 Women's Running Shoes

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Click first option in Choose Size screen

kw.name: Get Elements
kw.doc: This keyword for getting elements after verify these elements is visible ${elems} - Varargs of locators or elements

kw.name: Verify Elements Are Visible
kw.doc: This keyword verify that page contains elements specified in arguments and verify each element is visible ['android=UiSelector().resourceIdMatches(".*id/item_text$")'] - Varargs of locators or elements

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Get Webelements
kw.doc: Returns list of [http://selenium-python.readthedocs.io/api.html#module-selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement|WebElement] objects matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Get text of target element ${locator} - Locator of target element

test.name: Verify user as member can add item to Wishlist successfully

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |
